        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="3940" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="3940" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.96</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1599">1,599</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="172"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Blenheim Bouquet</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. <b>Blenheim Bouquet</b> was launched in 1902. The nose behind this fragrance is Walter Penhaligon. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                 </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">5</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">21</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May not suit all genders
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>
</pros-cons><div class="cell small-12"><p class="info-note" style="font-size: smaller"><b>Note:</b> The pros and cons listed on this page have been generated using the artificial intelligence system, which analyzes product reviews submitted by our members. While we strive to provide accurate and helpful information, we cannot guarantee the complete accuracy or reliability of the AI-generated pros and cons. <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2365825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2365825" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="melissonomos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745020"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="melissonomos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3940.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blenheim Bouquet"title="Blenheim Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2365825ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2365825" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745020">melissonomos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732967174" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blenheim Bouquet reminds me of summer at my grandparents’ house: my grandmother making G&amp;Ts, pine trees outside, mint growing in pots on the porch steps, my grandfather’s Listerine, my aunt wafting through in duty free perfume. There’s a little spice in the drydown, which is nice. It’s evocative and not unpleasant, but it smells expensive in a self-consciously subtle way: a careful performance of old money. It feels like a transatlantic businessman taking his kid to the British Museum and he definitely believes they should keep the Parthenon marbles. <br />
<br />
Will play around with the rest of my sample (I’m now trying it in winter, and I bet it’s nicer in hot weather) but it’s not for me in the long run. <br />
<br />
Moderate performance, weak sillage.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2365825"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2365825#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358389" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358389" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brxmxn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brxmxn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358389ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358389" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305348">Brxmxn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 03:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love penhaligons and this is one i thought I would adore sdince i love the semll of lemons but i just like it, it doesnt have the fresh lemony scent i am looking for its more of a lemon thats reminiscent of a exfoliating body wash</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2358389"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2358389#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352119" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352119" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="951Sensible"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="951Sensible" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352119ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352119" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754912">951Sensible</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>YUCK!  I don’t get anything “complex” about this. I wore it for several hours, and all I could get from it is LEMON FURNITURE POLISH… and NOTHING else.  I do NOT understand how Penhaligon’s could discontinue a BEAUTIFUL fragrance like Blasted Bloom - and keep producing a travesty such as this mess!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2352119"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2352119#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341245" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341245" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1taylorraee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2016603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="1taylorraee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Afternoon-Swim-53947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Afternoon Swim "title="Afternoon Swim "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341245ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341245" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016603">1taylorraee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is incredibly interesting. I've never smelt anything like it before. To me it smells straight up like salt which I think is coming from the citrus fruits. No sweetness, very sharp on the nose! I love the significance and history of it being related to Blenheim Palace.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2341245"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2341245#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320405" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 00:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's such a photorealistic lemon that I squeeze it on my Mediterranean salad and devour it. After a while, the scent of lavender begins to accompany it. My rosemary and lavender tea is ready with my salad (:<br />
Hard pass!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2320405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2320405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

</div></div><div id="parent2314252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314252" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kuldeep S"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161095"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1161095.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kuldeep S" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Ombre-Leather-Parfum-68716.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68716.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombré Leather Parfum"title="Ombré Leather Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1161095">Kuldeep S</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is like Lemon Candy . Dry down is like old school washing soap. <br />
It has good amount of similarity with aqua di parma colonia</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2314252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2314252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296900" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Featherblossom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Featherblossom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Elixir-78581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Elixir"title="Angel Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722364">Featherblossom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 09:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was surprised to see that this one is supposed to be for men. I was so sure it would be a unisex scent! I think both women and men could pull this off.<br />
<br />
It's a really refreshing minty lavender, perfect for a summer's day. Despite being an EDT, it lasts longer than some of Penhaligons' EDPs! The citus and pines add a light, airy yet foresty feel to it. I kind of really like it, and I'm considering buying a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2296900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2296900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
I finally gave blenheim bouquet a couple of full wearings and can't say it doesn't do much for me. It's photo-realistic Lemon, freshly cut and rubbed all over your skin, and then it just slowly fades away. I don't get much of anything else. On a blotter it's like the L&amp;P I mentioned earlier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2287807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2287807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Timeless Masterpiece !! <br />
I just had to repeat those words which many others below very rightly said about this.<br />
<br />
Yes citrus-forward in the beginning, but settles down to a more complex beauty especially with the pines !! <br />
and yes in its mid phase,  Agua Brava shares similarity with this.<br />
Never to be missed.Beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2281180"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2281180#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268556" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DivideDG3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DivideDG3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1959050">DivideDG3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a timeless fragrance. It definitely shows its age compared to the modern fragrances that are popular today, but it has its own unique charm to it. In the opening I'm hit with fresh citrus, primarily lemon. As it dries down, the pepper and pine start to come through and it becomes very green. I was honestly surprised by how much the scent progressed from the opening to the middle. As it continued to dry down, I get more of the citrus coming through blending with the pine and pepper to take away from the sharp edge of the pine specifically. I don't think I'll be purchasing a full bottle, but will most likely finish the sample.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2268556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2268556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257585" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257585" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hgf2008"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hgf2008" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257585ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257585" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817">Hgf2008</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stunningly classic - probably considered to be more traditionally masculine but would make a lovely summer scent for anyone. I would love to smell this on anyone. It smells quite timeless - it's missing the heavy ambroxan note that most modern men's fragrances come with (and is all the better for it).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2257585"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2257585#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255848" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255848" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coffee King"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/368581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.368581.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coffee King" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255848ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255848" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/368581">Coffee King</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 00:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blenheim Bouquet never fails to surprise me, it seems to perform better on warm, sunny days. That opening is so fresh, juicy and zingy lemons, super fresh, as it begins to dry down, you get a strong soapy vibe, before that unmistakable pine note.<br />
<br />
I'm a massive fan of 60's series The Avengers, I could definitely imagine John Steed wearing this, it definitely has the tailored Gentleman vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2255848"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2255848#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254823" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254823" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oTEMPE5To"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748370"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1748370.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oTEMPE5To" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10559.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sartorial"title="Sartorial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254823ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254823" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1748370">oTEMPE5To</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 22:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a new Zealand drink called L&amp;p on opening. Like, right on the money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2254823"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2254823#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254482" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Angeltoroa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124952"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2124952.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Angeltoroa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Her-51694.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51694.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Her"title="Burberry Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124952">Angeltoroa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 15:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initially I was happy because I thought I found a citrus that didn't immediately decay into bitter rinds on my skin, but as I waited for the dry down and smelled the pepper come through, it crossed my mind that I smell like seasoned steak. Now I can't get that out of my head.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2254482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2254482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253039" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253039ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253039" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 04:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blenheim Bouquet is one of Penhaligon's classic colognes and is one of their most well-known scents, being over a century old. I smelled this a few years ago after reading that this is (allegedly) Prince William's scent of choice, and liked it as much then as I do now. A radiantly fresh, aromatic barbershop cologne, it is simple but rounded and perfectly-balanced - there is no sharpness or harshness here. <br />
<br />
BB has a bright, fizzy citrus opening, fresh and bracing. I enjoy a lemon-lime accord, and here it sparkles, appearing crystal-clear - the olfactory equivalent of sunlight. The pine follows after a little while, soft and green, aromatic and mellow. Lavender follows closely, bringing BB firmly to barbershop territory. It becomes a sweetly musky skin scent, the lavender lingering. I also get a hint of dry vanilla in the base. Sillage is intimate and longevity is moderate. It is masculine-leaning in my opinion, and is a spring/summer daytime scent. <br />
<br />
A classic cologne with heritage and history, BB is effortlessly elegant and timeless. I would love this on a man. 4.5/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2253039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2253039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="2bClare"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="2bClare" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ramon-Monegal/Hazy-Rose-75076.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75076.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hazy Rose"title="Hazy Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961281">2bClare</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 11:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The clearest, brightest citrus notes lead Blenheim Bouquet off. This citrus is light and pure and not as full bodied and energetic as some citrus. It’s more like early morning sunshine, very gentle yet beautiful and completely present in a soft way.  It’s a round, buoyant citrus that feels lighthearted and joyful. After a while this citrus lightens even more and is joined by a pleasant musk base interlaced with the fresh and aromatic feeling of lavender and the lightest touch of pine. Everything about this is tasteful, fairly minimal and yet still sprightly. Even though this perfume is more than 100 years old, to me it has a youthful feeling. It also feels unisex, at least in this modern age. It may have been marketed to men originally but there’s nothing in this that feels overtly masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2223455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2223455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215346" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rmanukya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1407082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rmanukya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1407082">rmanukya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 10:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a classic citrus-forward, Men's cologne with so much backbone and character to the fragrance that it maintains a connection to modern palates. The beauty here is really in the dry down - probably 2 hours into wear, once the citrus has faded into a piney-lavender-musk a wonderfully cool-spicy facet is revealed that's really hard to get right in perfumery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2215346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2215346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197111" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="derby2169"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1389884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="derby2169" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1899-Hemingway-18846.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18846.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1899 Hemingway"title="1899 Hemingway"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884">derby2169</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ignore the haters below, I am convinced that the historically significant English snobbery that Penhaligons embraces triggers a certain olfactory blindness in people. Blenheim Bouquet was a delight to experience in a luxury hotel setting in every available form, lotion, shampoo, hand wash, conditioner and of course in pure form at the hotel perfumery. <br />
There are no surprises here, high quality citrus opening, dense, tart, ”yellow“ in every sense of the word. As expected clean, perhaps too much so for some people, but it settles quickly to a base I would describe more so cedar like with a good amount of elemi, which on its own already smells of green wood resin and black pepper. Underneath are clean musks and iso e according to my nose. <br />
<br />
Overall very invigorating, refreshing, well made. Classic, dry but not aggressively so. Blenheim Bouquet is definitely a scent I recommend more so as a bath product. Showering while it envelopes your senses is an elevating experience of its own. Something I would recommend to everyone. However, I don’t see myself wearing it. If so only transiently on warm summer nights at a fancy restaurant. <br />
Given the simplicity of the raw materials, citrus, cedar, elemi, iso e etc I highly doubt it costs more than 1% of its price to make, therefore best bought at a discount.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2197111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2197111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180845" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BMulroney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137435"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137435.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BMulroney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floris/No-89-5550.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5550.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="No 89"title="No 89"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180845ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180845" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137435">BMulroney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 04:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blenheim Bouquet is another fragrance from Penhaligon's that falls into the definition of being pleasant, but underwhelming. It is a classic, citrus men's cologne that is hugely overpriced and offers fairly lacklustre performance.<br />
<br />
The Penhaligon's line seems to comprise of a handful of offerings that really stand out amidst a large number of distinctly average perfumes that are overpriced.<br />
<br />
In use Blenheim Bouquet is perfectly acceptable and I will make some use of the 5ml bottle I have, but I will definitely not be buying any more of it. I own several classic colognes of this type, such as Acqua di Parma Colonia and 4711, that do a better job at a significantly lower cost.<br />
<br />
When Penhaligon's get it right, they do so spectacularly, but much of their range is simply trading on their legacy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2180845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2180845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144877" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2144877" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hansie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171703"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171703.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hansie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2144877ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2144877" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171703">Hansie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-03">05/03/24 17:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Christ on a bike! What do you call this darl?<br />
<br />
Pine-o-clean<br />
<br />
The one time I am glad of Penhaligon's poor longevity.<br />
<br />
Had to scrub this off and would not like to smell it on a man. I love Halfeti, The tragedy of Lord George, Endymion...probably many others.... but Blenheim Bouquet smells like cleaning product. Try before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2144877"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2144877#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127709" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245360">komail</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 00:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very fizzy and sparkly lemons and limes. It feels almost like an ice cold cup of 7up or Sprite. I like the addition of lavender and pine which gives it a mature twist. This is a classy fresh and clean fragrance. I think this would be perfect in summer under scorching hot sun. I don’t believe its meant to be used in other seasons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2110406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2110406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660">Antoshka2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 15:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful burst of fresh lemons and then it turns more green and piney but very piney, kinda like a Christmas tree with lemons. Definitely not for people who dislike pine. I can’t tell you what any other notes are except citrus and pine but they work really well together. It’s so clean and refreshing. I only bought it because it’s so old and associated with the royal family, I just wanted to smell it and I  didn’t expect to like it. Suitable for all occasions, day or night, formal or casual. A must try for fragrance enthusiasts. That pine is a lot though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2077181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2077181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is an expensive scent that smells of soap but is far too pricey for what you get. Honestly, this was a sample and I would have never purchased this. <br />
<br />
Rating: 3/5<br />
Recommendation: Miss</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2032568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2032568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2027566" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JetSnail22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1602290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JetSnail22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2027566ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2027566" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602290">JetSnail22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-11">01/11/24 06:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like my clean father in the morning after his everyday spa ritual - shower, shaving with the lemon foam and eau de cologne as the last move. <br />
Good to know this edt was first created for the Duke of Marlborough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2027566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2027566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023957" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shpeeep"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919038"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1919038.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shpeeep" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Reminiscence/Patchouli-4712.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4712.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Patchouli"title="Patchouli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023957ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023957" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1919038">Shpeeep</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 20:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel like I must be suppressing a memory of smelling this on someone who acted terribly, unforgivably, because why do I intensely dislike this objectively tame and pleasant scent? I enjoy all the notes in this in other fragrances, but I hate this. I think this is a good clean smell that would probably be nice for a clinical setting or a car air freshener in a luxury vehicle, but for unknown reasons it is intolerably obnoxious to me. At initial spray I thought 'I'm not blown away, it's not as nice as I expected, but I'll give it a fair try' at 25 minutes on the skin I thought 'why do I have a sense that I'm being watched by n entitled and very very wealthy 60ish year old man?' and realised it's this scent so I scrubbed it. I imagine the longevity would be good based on how difficult it is to remove from skin. I do apologise if this is a useless review, since clearly its 'just not for me' and a high quality fragrance. Even after washing it off I'm getting whiffs and they make me feel perturbed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2023957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2023957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015993" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Owen Bawn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740382"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740382.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Owen Bawn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Touch-for-Men-815.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.815.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Touch for Men"title="Touch for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015993ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015993" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740382">Owen Bawn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-31">12/31/23 05:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are a man who must project calm and quiet confidence without calling attention, Blenheim Bouquet remains the perfect choice. Physicians, psychiatrists and counselors, clergy, academics, and judges should consider this as an option for the workplace. While many are quick to point out that Blenheim was a favourite of Winston Churchill's, the fact that it was the daily fragrance of Pope John Paul II makes my point brilliantly. It's simple, unobtrusive, and calming. I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2015993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2015993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
