padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1946044" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tamovicha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1731057.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tamovicha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1946044ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1946044" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731057">tamovicha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 23:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells exactly like a lemon candy or lozenge, or for those in Europe "Garage Hard Lemonade". Very very pleasant, welcoming and non-overpowering. I'm a little surprised as to why this has been such a popular fragrance for so long - it's nothing that special and extremely overpriced. But I see that a scent like this could be very nostalgic</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1946044"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1946044#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1945096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1945096" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MKnocker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583026"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1583026.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MKnocker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-Cologne-51692.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51692.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus Cologne"title="Aventus Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1945096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1945096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583026">MKnocker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-05">10/05/23 18:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like Rojas Elysium Parfum but doesn’t perform at all. I realize this is an EDT but it’s really weak even knowing that. Super linear. Very citrusy. Lemon dominate. Don’t buy unless you want to respray every 2 hours. And you’ll need a healthy amount of sprays to project. At least you can get away with doing this because it’s so linear. <br />
<br />
Hard Pass. This only works as a $20 cheapie. Not $170 100 ml.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1945096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1945096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927933" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Eau-de-Rochas-2361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rochas"title="Eau de Rochas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923">COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like the greatest household cleaner, and/or plug-in ever.  I know that sentence doesn't convey the adoration I have for it, but that's really what it smells like.  As the previous commenter said, the opening does smell like a professional perfumer, recreated lemon pledge with all-natural oils.  The lavender evens out the citrus in a meaningful way before the pepper and pine base show you why this lemon pledge scent has been popular for so long.<br />
<br />
I would not wear it as perfume, but I am going to drench my linens in it for spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1927933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1927933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915589" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JLH76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1453458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JLH76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ajmal/Tonka-56396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka"title="Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453458">JLH76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm going to come right out and say it:  Lemon Pledge.  That's it.<br />
About 2 hours of longevity, pure citrus.<br />
There's a VERY slight lavender in the dry down but it's hardly noticeable.<br />
<br />
It's not unpleasant in any way but how this has been a classic for over a century mystifies me.  There's no depth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1915589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1915589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1894735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1894735" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonkaBeanTruck"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231029"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231029.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonkaBeanTruck" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1894735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1894735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231029">TonkaBeanTruck</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-05">08/05/23 05:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lemon, Lime and Pepper are the main notes I receive but, you know the Lavender, Pine &amp; Musk are the glue faintly holding it altogether. <br />
<br />
The combination of Lemon and Pepper feign a ginger like nuance.<br />
.<br />
Realistic and high quality. <br />
<br />
The Pepper gives it masculinity. <br />
<br />
Very similar to, Bayolea without the warmth and Cedar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1894735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1894735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877479" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877479" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WeezyPipes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1764595.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WeezyPipes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877479ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877479" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764595">WeezyPipes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 23:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I will say this smells much better than Quercus and lasts longer too. The lemon is tart and present until the end, it's very linear that way but I don't mind. The other notes give it a bit of an elderly/mothball impression but overall it smells like old money, not a retirement home. <br />
<br />
I got this in the sample collection and I don't think it's worth buying a bottle, it's too light and simple, but I'm going to use it up. It only lasts for a few hours so I apply it liberally in the evenings after my work fragrance wears off. It's a nice fresh pick-me-up but TDH Eau Givree scratches the same classy citrus itch for me (and then some)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1877479"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1877479#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The pepper citruses/aromatics combination translates smoky on my skin, which I don’t mind at all. Fresh, light citrus with a dash of smoke. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1844868" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheFragrantGentleman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1760325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheFragrantGentleman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1844868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1844868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); The opening is abundant in Lemon and Ginger, with more subtle Lime and Lemongrass notes. The Lavender and Musk support and fill out the fragrance with a pleasing and refreshing feel that sits close to the skin. Needs reapplication every few hours. A great, if somewhat fleeting, fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1844868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1844868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1842430" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831858" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hojubaby"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hojubaby" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Tilia-91688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tilia"title="Tilia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178633">Hojubaby</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-13">05/13/23 01:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a sharp beautiful citrusy, soapy, powdery, creamy fragrance off my skin, definitely leans male. Very classic citrusy scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1831858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1831858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1822342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Katchke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Katchke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rose-Eau-De-Parfum-71661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"title="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1822342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1822342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035">Katchke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-01">05/01/23 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very citronella forward. I felt like I could repel bugs. The pine note really came through on my skin. Definitely a very dry citrus, not soapy or powdery but in a way, because it didn't smell particularly good on me it made it feel like a very fancy gentleman of a decade prior. Sort of a stoic, blunt smell, and definitely masculine. Little to zero sillage :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1822342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1822342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1809939" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1809939" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1809939ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1809939" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-15">04/15/23 21:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is quite invoked a deep memory of my late father❤️🩹 Him washing the dishes in the summer after us having fried chicken takeout. It is a mixture of strong lemon citrus 🍋with a drydown of peppery pine🌲. It's more of a masculine scent– as much as this fragrance unlocked something inside me- it's not a perfume I'd wear. For someone who likes acidic bright perfumes, this is for you. Also, probably the strongest sillage out of all the Penhaligon's perfumes I've tried.<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
⬆️Leo ☀️Gemini 🌜Aries</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1809939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1809939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1800960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1800960" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Knightsbridge9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232252"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1232252.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Knightsbridge9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-31396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti"title="Halfeti"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1800960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1800960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232252">Knightsbridge9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-05">04/05/23 04:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought for my father who is also a massive fan of Penhaligons Sartorial. Blenheim Bouquet is a classic citrus fragrance perfect for the discerning gentlemen. Great for spring and summer and lasts a decent amount of time. Really just a perfume you tend to repurchase every few years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1800960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1800960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1799376" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="buzzmander"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="buzzmander" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1799376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1799376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708330">buzzmander</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-03">04/03/23 09:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells very clean, without being neither powdery nor soapy (I especially do not care for powdery). The opening citrus notes do not last very long, although they're wonderful for the time they're there. Then, the woody notes come through. I smell a wonderful cedar note, whereas most smell pine. Regardless, it's magnificent. No wonder Blenheim Bouquet been around so long. It's not a predator fragrance, begging for everyone to notice it, and I doubt most would consider it sexy. It's super fresh and clean, and all phases of the scent are wonderful. It's a masculine scent in my mind, except for maybe the first 30 minutes or so, where I believe it could be unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1799376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1799376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786427" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="msladyevans"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1087866"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="msladyevans" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786427ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786427" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1087866">msladyevans</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-18">03/18/23 04:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Recommended if you're an aristocrat with plenty of money to burn, because that's exactly what you'll smell like wearing this. Fragrantica's listed notes are what you get, nothing more and nothing less. BB features a strong citrus opening with a clean pine drydown. My understanding is that in its day this scent was a novel thing and the first of its type. It's not particularly complex, but it is well blended and the ingredients are of an obvious high quality (at least in my bottle, which is circa 2006 or so). Very little lasting power, and looking at prices today this is massively overpriced, however it was my first real love in fragrance and it will always hold a special place in my heart as it's what I wore for my wedding (even though I'm not an aristocrat, and neither do I have plenty of money to burn).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1786427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1786427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748871" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oscark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639075"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oscark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639075">Oscark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 06:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do like this fragrance, however, I cannot get past the opening scent being very comparable to lemon hand wipes, or a lemon scented dish soap. So I was very glad that the top notes seemed to die down quite soon after applying, revealing the beautifully elegant and masculine pine and pepper undertones, with the citrus remaining very subtly in the background. As of the lavender, I do not get too much of it however you can definitely acknowledge its presence and I do appreciate it for not being too overpowering and letting the pine and pepper being the main face of the fragrance, overall, i really enjoy the smoky, piney and citrus themes and find it to be rather unique, and very British smelling, reminiscent of the English countryside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1748871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1748871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1694662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1694662" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Xeryus-861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Xeryus"title="Xeryus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1694662ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1694662" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-23">11/23/22 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the oldest and probably the most famous of Penhaligon's fragrances, this was worn by Winston Churchill (because of the name, which evokes his ancestral birthplace of Blenheim palace in Oxfordshire) and (reputedly) Prince William.<br />
<br />
This has been much imitated, and is a classic pretty fougére with lots of sweet Amalfi lemon on top, and a piney-musky finish. It might make a great gift because of its associations with the British nobility, although you can get other quite similar fragrances probably for much cheaper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1694662"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1694662#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1693351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1693351" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="erika.isme.98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404278"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1404278.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="erika.isme.98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1693351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1693351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404278">erika.isme.98</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-21">11/21/22 16:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Things my partner compares this scent to despite me liking it:<br />
-Cleaner<br />
-Pencil eraser<br />
<br />
Too bad! It smells to me like home. <br />
<br />
 Nostalgic and gentle and comfortable. I grew up in North Carolina and the smells of lemon/lime remind me (only in the context of this fragrance) of my days drinking Sprite and eating homemade key lime pie. I would often overload my stepdad's coleslaw with black pepper. <br />
<br />
 I was often writing creative stories with old school pencils and being paid to clean my parents' once gigantic bathroom that had nice candles and a roomy bathtub I liked to spend time in. I would dance around and take my time cleaning thoroughly and enjoying the scent of their strongly scented lavender scented soap. Natural light and the shadow of pine trees filled our homes throughout my childhood. <br />
<br />
This must be why the notes in Blehmian Bouquet give me comfort. I will defend it with my full chest!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1693351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1693351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1689851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1689851" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ROUSAK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34561"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ROUSAK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1689851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1689851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34561">ROUSAK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-16">11/16/22 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very British fragrance. Lemon, lavender pepper blend. .  7/10  however because Winston Churchill wore this and its historical feeling . 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1689851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1689851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1684755" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lct"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1499164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lct" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Pure-XS-For-Her-51424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure XS For Her"title="Pure XS For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1684755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1684755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1499164">lct</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-09">11/09/22 13:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells just like cleaning wipes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1684755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1684755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1654611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1654611" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EllenaDsk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="EllenaDsk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Barenia-96428.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96428.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barénia"title="Barénia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1654611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1654611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1130928">EllenaDsk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-28">09/28/22 05:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Came here to tell that I recognized BB in "The Crown" as a part of King Edward's VIII fragrance collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1654611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1654611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1641445" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alphairone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1213298.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alphairone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Claudio-La-Viola/La-Lettera-Da-43914.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43914.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Lettera Da..."title="La Lettera Da..."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1641445ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1641445" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213298">alphairone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-09">09/09/22 07:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In honor of Her Royal Majesty, I have chosen to profile the iconic house of Penhaligon's, specifically Blenheim Bouquet, a charming, noble aromatic. No, this is not modern one bit, its citruses perhaps too lemony and limey (no pun intended, I assure you) for 21st century nares with nary a rogue hair to suggest maturity. Well-groomed and well-heeled sensibilities are so out of place in this age of sweatpants as fashion statements and wearing white trainers after Labor Day. As the youth of today blaspheme while either smelling of nothing (clean living, yo!) or reeking of too much (beast mode!), Blenheim Bouquet is lost in time.<br />
<br />
Penhaligon's was, at least until desperation and Christian Provenzano walked through the door, the epitome of aristocratic fragrance. Princess Diana's Bluebell was set aside for sensory assaults such as Halfeti and tepid mainstream in sheep's clothing such as Brilliantly British. More recent masterpieces such as Ostara, Tra La La, and Elixir were discontinued before they barely could be discovered by a larger population because the bean counters are breathing down necks. Don't even get me started on those ghastly decapitated menagerie bottles. Yet, Blenheim remains (for now), pine needle-y, peppery, fresh, yet musky enough to be a bit fleshy. Simple, classic, and not overly adorned. Proper.<br />
<br />
I do fear that we may be in the sunset of this age in perfumery and personal accoutrements, and while it all still holds on by a thread, why not relish it? Corporate conglomerate whales may well swallow us all whole, so why not go out in style...<br />
<br />
RIP Queen Elizabeth II</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1641445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1641445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1631767" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="greg.3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="greg.3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1631767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1631767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1508625">greg.3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-26">08/26/22 06:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blenheim Bouquet is one of the vials that came in my Penhaligon's 10 pc sample set I purchased in Epcot UK this summer.   I am trying it today for the first time, and instantly liked the scent off my skin.   There is a prominent lemon/lime opening with a good amount of pine, and now that it's beginning to dry down I can pick up some of the pepper. I also smell a little rosemary or herbal/green mixed in the dry down as well.   I think this scent opens unisex, but drys down a bit more masculine.   Will put this on my short list with Halfeti, Quercus, and Juniper Sling as my favorites from the house so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1631767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1631767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1630309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1630309" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gedlive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gedlive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Equipage-7.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Equipage"title="Equipage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1630309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1630309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522">gedlive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-24">08/24/22 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just put this as my signature fragrance.<br />
Good fragrances with PINE are getting rare.<br />
This has a nice pine note that is so comforting to me.<br />
It was hard to pick out sometimes, but as I am revisiting it today after a long lay off, I get it.<br />
<br />
The fresh and zesty accord of lemon and pepper are great, and the nice soothing lavender just make it the perfect signature scent. Simple, great, classic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1630309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1630309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1619882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1619882" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Made by Kouros"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1395030.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Made by Kouros" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1619882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1619882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395030">Made by Kouros</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-08">08/08/22 22:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lovely light, simple cologne. I get citruses, pine and fresh English lavender, then white musk in the dry down. Blenheim Bouquet is very nice, but how to stand out among all the other light citrus colognes? Maybe this does it with its history mostly - it's a true gentlemen's classic, over a century old.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1619882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1619882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1610684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1610684" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BaldBoyBaris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1517379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BaldBoyBaris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Whispers-in-the-Library-53537.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53537.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Whispers in the Library"title="Whispers in the Library"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1610684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1610684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517379">BaldBoyBaris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-26">07/26/22 01:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Start with sour lime + spicy lavender (a bit like ginger) + a taste of lemon-flavored sour candy. Refreshing, with a carbonated drink feel.<br />
The back notes go into pine and some black pepper. Comfortable woody notes.<br />
It's good, but not to the extent that I want to buy it.<br />
The sour-candy-feel artificiality makes me remember this perfume, and this pleases me sometime but also upsets me sometime.<br />
------<br />
刚喷上是酸度很高的青柠+辛辣的薰衣草（甚至有点像姜）+一种柠檬酸糖的味道。很清凉，还带着碳酸饮料的感觉。<br />
后调是松针和黑胡椒，是一个舒服温和的木质香。<br />
蛮不错的，但也没有到让我想买它的程度。<br />
酸糖这样的人工感是很突出的一个特征，不知道是不是别人也有这种感觉。</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1610684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1610684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1610456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1610456" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lykopa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lykopa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-di-Parma-Blu-Mediterraneo-Fico-di-Amalfi-1687.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1687.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"title="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1610456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1610456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443">Lykopa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-25">07/25/22 15:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this scent on men. I gave my sample to my brother. It is a lemony floral that smells like a fresh clean shave. The pine and pepper add a nice kick. Highly recommend for those who want a masculine spritz in the morning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1610456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1610456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1608619" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1608619" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DCJames"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1483600"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1483600.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DCJames" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Lab/Neroli-Negro-89836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli Negro"title="Neroli Negro"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1608619ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1608619" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1483600">DCJames</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-22">07/22/22 18:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon’s Blenheim Bouquet opens with an amazingly bright and lemony citrus rush. Not overly astringent or at all unpleasant but man this is a serious citrus bomb at the outset. Within a few minutes it evolves and begins to remind me of candied lemon rinds. Sweet yet still very citrus forward with a bright floral note that I can only attribute to the lavender note. In dry down it becomes a bit peppery with a very smooth musk that adds a bit of creaminess and depth. This is one of those fragrances that I can’t stop smelling. Projection is on the weaker side of moderate but for those in closer proximity I can’t imagine anyone not enjoying this scent as you pass by. Perfect office fragrance and definitely an easy reach on a hot summer day. Currently I have a 5 ml decant and unless something changes before it’s depleted I’m thinking I will be buying a full bottle soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1608619"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1608619#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1605888" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think its very relevant in 2022 and I despise old smelling perfumes with a burning passion. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1593851" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daisv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336475"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1336475.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daisv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62615.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angels' Share"title="Angels' Share"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1593851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1593851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1336475">Daisv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-29">06/29/22 16:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A-R-O-M-A-T-I-C<br />
Woah! Like a slap in the face! This initial spray is heavy heavy Old English Lemon Oil, u know the Kind in the dark plastic bottle you use to polish up your Wood. Yes, that is the direct comparison I can pin Blenheim Bouquet to. It is citrusy due to the overipe Lemon, but as it dries down it is giving me Fruity Loops cereal milk.. The leftover hyper sweet milk saturated from the sugary cereal. Yes Absolutely, I am inhaling it as much as I can and this is the scent I am picking up. Imagine the mixture of OLD English Lemon Oil polisher and Fruity Loops Cereal milk... yes. I could do this as a house scent but not for personal wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1593851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1593851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1593554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1593554" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DS9Dax"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396246"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1396246.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DS9Dax" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Carmina-84206.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84206.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carmina"title="Carmina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1593554ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1593554" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); Lime prominent. Not sweet at all. Clean and fresh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1593554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1593554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1548185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
