I wish I was joking. I'm actually shocked to not see more people saying this. Maybe their comments have been voted down for being negative about a classic, but it's the truth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1548185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1548185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1536126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1536126" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violetelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1419735.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violetelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Matine/Avant-l-Orage-57295.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57295.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Avant l’Orage"title="Avant l’Orage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1536126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1536126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419735">violetelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-03">04/03/22 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my dad’s favourite scent. I think it’s lovely - smells expensive and refined. Really well composed, it is of course a citrus dominant scent but I don’t find it astringent, in fact it’s soft in an assertive way. I can’t give a very accurate description of the scent itself because I don’t wear it but I do think it’s a really good one. Good for all ages and seasons, although best in warmer months imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1536126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1536126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1510130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1510130" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Raudskeggr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Raudskeggr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-56358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1510130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1510130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1437085">Raudskeggr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-22">02/22/22 22:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bright Peppery Citrus, backed by slightly astringent balsamic notes.  <br />
<br />
Top is a bergamot bomb.   Lemon is listed as the key top note here, and there is lemonyness there, but for me it's in your face bergamot.  Fresh, clean, and invigorating.  Dry down is a mostly pepper with just a hint of pine needles.   <br />
<br />
decent projection, EDC-level longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1510130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1510130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1492821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1492821" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FancyPants"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1443896.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FancyPants" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1492821ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1492821" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1443896">FancyPants</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-28">01/28/22 09:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This used to be my daily fragrance... I absolutely adored it. I still do.<br />
Unfortunately for me, it didn't last on my skin, so a 100ml bottle would only last me a few months. I can't justify the high price every few months.<br />
<br />
But what an incredible scent. It's such a versatile fragrance that can be worn everyday at any time. Sparkling citrus that has a pepper edge to it. Beautifully balanced with nothing overpowering.<br />
It's just a shame that it doesn't last long.<br />
<br />
Thanks for reading.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1492821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1492821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1486007" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But lemon isn’t my thing. However, it is worth sampling if you’re looking for a lemon scent; because I think you’ll be very pleased.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1486007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1486007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1484263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1484263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1484263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1480841" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1480841" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="antoniov"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="antoniov" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1480841ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1480841" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412066">antoniov</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-11">01/11/22 06:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one has a very weird lemon scent on my skin. I usually like citrus-y smells but this one is weird, it's like old type lemon candy or as someone said below "Listerine mouthwash". Definitely don't blind buy this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1480841"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1480841#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1472578" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1472578" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Margot T"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146646"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1146646.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Margot T" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1472578ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1472578" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1146646">Margot T</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-29">12/29/21 12:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m getting a real Emperor’s New Clothes vibe.<br />
(Classic story for children, research it if you are unfamiliar)<br />
<br />
After reading all of the reviews of “refinement”, “bright”, “effervescent”, “citrus”, etc- I ordered a bottle and a small tester to try as we do not have a Penhaligon’s shop here.<br />
Are we not going to talk about the “rubber tire” note?<br />
There is a weird citrus upon the first spray, it lasts about 30 seconds and quickly morphs into a rubber tire smell on me which it maintains for the rest of it’s short life.<br />
I should say after about 45 minutes, it smells of baby powder coated rubber tires.<br />
<br />
I detect Listerine mouthwash, old man aftershave and rubber tires. That’s it.<br />
No pine, not much citrus, nothing that I was expecting based on the reviews and clout of this house.<br />
Not a blind purchase for sure.<br />
I can’t wait to return the bottle.<br />
<br />
Regarding Penhaligon’s, I do like Juniper Sling and Halfeti but Blenheim Bouquet is a no way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1472578"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1472578#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1430896" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1430896" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frozen_music"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1399896.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frozen_music" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Castile-4564.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4564.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Castile"title="Castile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1430896ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1430896" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1399896">frozen_music</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-19">10/19/21 11:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't read anything about this fragrance before spraying. Based on the name I was expecting rose and other floral notes so was surprised to get strong citrus with the lavendar as I first sprayed it. One commenter below said it reminded them of the hot flannels you get in some restaurants and on planes and I can totally see what they mean. Though it's certainly a scent that makes you feel awake and alert.<br />
<br />
As it settles the citrus and lavendar fade significantly and the pine starts to take the stage with a slight peppery undertone. It becomes quite a green and woody scent. Unfortunately it reminds me a little of certain types of toilet spray (though is clearly of superior blend and quality). Quite disapointed overall. Not one I'd wear and wouldn't be a fan of it on my partner either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1430896"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1430896#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1421378" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1421378" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaylietam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396245"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaylietam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1421378ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1421378" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396245">kaylietam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-03">10/03/21 08:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin Blenheim Bouquet smells like ginger flower, which quickly transitions to a leathery middle note, then eventually dries down to a clean soap-like bottom note. Strangely I do not detect any citrus notes on my skin, and I find the leather a little too overpowering. Leans a little too masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1421378"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1421378#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1416593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1416593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lihsinhsu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lihsinhsu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1416593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1416593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388">lihsinhsu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-25">09/25/21 01:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like the kind of scent a 4 to 5 star hotel would have in their lobby and hallways. It's nice but not fragrance material for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1416593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1416593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1371382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1364700" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Salalome"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233088"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1233088.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Salalome" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/The-Ghost-In-The-Shell-69412.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69412.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Ghost In The Shell"title="The Ghost In The Shell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1364700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1364700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233088">Salalome</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-23">06/23/21 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This and Luna are more of an aromatherapy typ of smell to me. Both have a calming efect. However this one smells exactly like some taps my mom used to desolve in hot water and make me inhale when I had a cold. So a no from me...<br />
Edit: Hubby and Son love this and on their skin the lemon is dominant instead of the pineneedles. Hubby confirmed it dosen't sit well with my skin. <br />
But this is a good lemon scent! Lasts about 4-5hrs close to skin and that is exeptional for a light lemon</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1364700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1364700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1361545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1361545" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1361545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1361545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-17">06/17/21 11:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm female and this works as unisex, the scent is pleasant citrus with a peppery, musky undertone. Doesn't last that long though, very watery. Supposedly over 100 years old and worn by the Duke of Edinburgh and Winston Churchill I was curious but let down. It's nice but I wasn't impressed. I'll finish my sample but there are scents in my sample pack that I'd buy over this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1361545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1361545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1357307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1357307" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Peter The Fragrance Lover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283816"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1283816.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Peter The Fragrance Lover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1357307ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1357307" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283816">Peter The Fragrance Lover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-09">06/09/21 16:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Winston Churchill, the iconic and legendary larger than life British Prime Minister, who valiantly led the outnumbered and outgunned British nation against Nazi Germany between 1939-1945, was allegedly a fragrance enthusiast, and rumors have it, that Mr Churchill had two signature fragrances:<br />
<br />
Floris Special No 127 and Penhaligon's Blenheim Bouquet.<br />
<br />
I've written an earlier review on Floris Special No 127.<br />
<br />
What does Penhaligon's Blenheim Bouquet smell like? Right of the bat, I can tell you that this is either a unisex fragrance or a scent that leans slightly to the masculine side of the spectrum.<br />
<br />
It has minimum sillage and projection and lasts probably 1-2 hours maximum on my skin, and smells like a piece of paper, scented with a lemony citrus and pepper. <br />
<br />
Literally, that's what Penhaligon's legendary and storied Blenheim Bouquet smells like on my skin: Paper, lemony citrus and pepper.<br />
<br />
Underwhelming, lacks character and complexity. Dowdy and disappointing.<br />
<br />
A scent that unfortunately doesn't even remotely remind me of its legendary larger than life wearer Winston Churchill.<br />
<br />
Final score: 4/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1357307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1357307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1351742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1351742" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blossomka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blossomka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1351742ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1351742" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912">blossomka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-30">05/30/21 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>8.5/10. As a female I would buy this perfume even though it is for men. This is my favorite Penhaligon’s perfume and is most interesting. I do not think it is too masculine. It is pure without much musk and even though girly floral notes are absent, the pine and herbal blend is just right for me. Relaxing, comforting and slightly stimulating at the same time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1351742"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1351742#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1350856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1350856" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1350856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1350856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660">J350</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-28">05/28/21 17:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first, I hated this fragrance. I found the amalfi lemon and lime to overpowering and offensive in the nose. However, the dry down is where I fell in love with this fragrance. It’s got the perfect and balanced blend of pine, lavender and musk. It’s the perfect summer scent, day or night but I think this could easily pass for a daytime winter wear. Very versatile I’d say. The dry down is the perfect combination of a woody and citrus scent. This to me screams timelessness and class. It means more on the masculine side and I’d say is the perfect started fragrance for those who want to start building up their wardrobe. Longevity and sillage is good. <br />
<br />
My overall rating: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1350856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1350856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1321935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1321935" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bison blues"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1194511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bison blues" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Ambre-Nuit-7092.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7092.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Nuit"title="Ambre Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1321935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1321935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194511">Bison blues</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-08">04/08/21 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful lemon lime musk opening that lives throughout the life of the frag, but the pine and pepper peep through... this is one I had to wear multiple times to appreciate the nuances and longevity of this scent. Dior homme cologne with prestige.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1321935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1321935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1314244" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1314244" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tonkatsu335"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254643.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tonkatsu335" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Linda-Landenberg/A-Trembling-Rose-47015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A Trembling Rose"title="A Trembling Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1314244ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1314244" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643">tonkatsu335</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-26">03/26/21 04:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a sparking, awakening scent of lemon and lime.<br />
After the top notes, it becomes a calming scent of pine and pepper.<br />
<br />
It is a refreshing scent that is perfect for summer, but it disappears too quickly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1314244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1314244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1306483" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1306483" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheSniffer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheSniffer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frapin/1270-5325.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5325.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1270"title="1270"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1306483ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1306483" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262374">TheSniffer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-12">03/12/21 07:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells identical to those hot lemon flannels they bring you after the main course at Indian restaurants. I wish I had more to say but that’s it. 100% ‘Hot Lemon Flannel Por Homme’. Not my thing personally, but someone else may enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1306483"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1306483#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1301838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1301838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tulpan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tulpan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rihanna/Reb-l-Fleur-10554.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10554.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reb'l Fleur"title="Reb'l Fleur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1301838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1301838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821">Tulpan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-03">03/03/21 13:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A fresh burst of lemon oil and bergamot makes it invigorating and awakening. It's like summer in a bottle. The musk softens the citruses making it a not too aggressive scent. The pine and black pepper soon come through making it masculine leaning. I quite like the pepper in this one, it makes it interesting in what otherwise would be a very safe option.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1301838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1301838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1299775" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1299775" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gedlive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gedlive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Equipage-7.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Equipage"title="Equipage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1299775ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1299775" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522">gedlive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-27">02/27/21 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was looking for a Summertime Pine fragrance, so I purchased Creed Epicea, Dior Granville, and Byredo Gypsy Water. Then I found a good deal for a 100 ml tester of Blenheim Bouquet.<br />
Dissapointed that none have a clear, or dominant pine.<br />
Gypsy Water has the most noticable pine note of the 4.<br />
<br />
Blenheim Bouquet is very much like Granville, but inferior. The notes are good quality, but I gave Dior Granville a 10/10 rating. <br />
Blenheim Bouquet has an herbal note they are not listing, that blends with the citrus, giving the citrus a bitter green accord.<br />
<br />
BB came out before Granville, but Granville is just more complex, smoother, better crafted. It's like Tom Ford Italian Cypress coming out after Halston Z-14, very similar, but higher quality.<br />
The pine in BB is slightly more noticable than in Dior Granville.<br />
<br />
I like Blenheim Bouquet a lot also, it's dry, crisp and clean.<br />
It's not a total clone of Granville, it has some subtle difference that I will enjoy. So it's not totally redundant.<br />
I like the lavender here, that Granville doesn't have.<br />
<br />
The pine becomes slightly discernible from the mid- dry-down.<br />
It has a great musky dry-down that's warm and creamy, with some of the peppery, slightly sweet pine lingering. A nice evolution, and contrast from the dry citrus opening and mid.<br />
<br />
I have a large mostly niche collection, but I can see myself wearing this a lot in Summer, as a great go-to casual. It's classy with a simple fresh eligance.<br />
<br />
Rating: 8.5/10<br />
<br />
God bless.  John 3:16</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1299775"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1299775#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1275073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1275073" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1275073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1275073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-12">01/12/21 22:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens juicy, crisp, and fresh, with sweet citrus and green, woodsy spice. However, the citrus top notes are very short-lived, and as they fade they seem to take the crisp, green woodsiness of the pine with them. <br />
<br />
It’s honestly like Blenheim Bouquet is a woodsy freshie for the first ten minutes, and then morphs into a completely different fragrance. After half an hour, what’s left (at least on my skin) is a sweet, papery lavender, with a powdery herbal, slightly mentholated note (which is actually the remnants of the pine and pepper mixing with the lavender and musk). <br />
<br />
Beyond the dry down, I find Blenheim Bouquet faded and lifeless. It makes me think of sifting through dusty black-and-white wedding photos of a pretty, young couple, whom you are distantly related to, and never met. The photos—once lively and meaningful memories—are now faded and wistfully impersonal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1275073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1275073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1251695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1251695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1251695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1251695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834">MaquiLab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-22">11/22/20 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm seriously falling in love with this house! Blenheim Bouquet is another gorgeous creation. The opening is a brilliant mix of sweet citrus and lavender, which then subsides to make way for a thyme tea drydown. This is exactly what traditional thyme (or herbal mix) tea smells like in my country, Bulgaria. It makes me think of cosy blankets, rainy days and the mountains.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1251695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1251695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1243191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1243191" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dvdira"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220366.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dvdira" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Bleecker-Street-1301.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1301.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleecker Street"title="Bleecker Street"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1243191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1243191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220366">dvdira</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-30">10/30/20 19:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought a 5ml decant of this just to make sure I didn't have anything similar in my collection. Has the same vibe to me off the spray as AdP Essenza di Colonia and Ferragamo Acqua Essenziale Colonia, but on the drydown this has more personality when the pepper kicks in gently. This comes across as versatile Lime/Pine or even Lemongrass overall, and I love it! <br />
<br />
Gotta love the performance too.... it lasts 4-5 hours thereabouts on my skin, and much longer on the clothes. Also projects well at 3,4 feet away in the first hour.  No complaints at all, perfect for a regular day at the office. <br />
<br />
Looking to get a full bottle as soon as my lime frag runs out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1243191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1243191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1221216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Knowing that it's a legendary svent, adds quite a bit to the overall impression. Unfortunately I can't smell any lavender and the lemongrass note is dominant, but it's still nice, aromatic and refreshing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1220352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1220352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1198330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1160021" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="richmilton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1020788"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1020788.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="richmilton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Heritage-Eau-de-Toilette-1880.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1880.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heritage Eau de Toilette"title="Heritage Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1160021ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1160021" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1020788">richmilton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-01">04/01/20 07:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just imagine this legend being around since 1902! Geez most people was still on horseback and riding in horse carts then. I'm sure the scent changed somewhat because for a long time only natural ingredients was used in most colognes/perfumes. <br />
<br />
With the name Bouquet I expected it to be a masculine barbershop floral which was so popular during the early 1900's. However, there's very little floral in this juice. It's mainly a citrus, piney, soapy lavender and with a musky dry down. Certainly for the an older gentlemen (40+) and ideal for Spring season or early Summer. Performance on my skin is average but I get excellent lonegvity on clothes. 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1160021"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1160021#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1146203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
