padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc878052" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lishypants"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1077206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1077206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lishypants" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Bibliotheque-43324.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43324.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bibliothèque"title="Bibliothèque"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma878052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd878052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1077206">Lishypants</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-06">11/06/17 23:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Musty rag with dried out lemon pine cleaner. I find this very dried out - like preseved lemon, not fresh at all. Bit too much old man vibes.<br />
⛤</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="878052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=878052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent921840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc921840" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="herecomesbob"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1105206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="herecomesbob" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Eau-d-Ombre-Leather-95389.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95389.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau d'Ombré Leather"title="Eau d'Ombré Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma921840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd921840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105206">herecomesbob</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-03-14">03/14/18 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dried lemon peel, black pepper, pine - I don't really get the lavender.<br />
<br />
I can't decide whether this smells more like over-brewed chamomile lemon tisane or lemon Fisherman's Friend throat lozenges. I think the throat lozenges. Needless to say, neither of those are what I'd particularly care to smell like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="921840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=921840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1548185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1548185" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steven221283"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steven221283" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1548185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1548185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486">Steven221283</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-21">04/21/22 16:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Literally smells like some cleaning wipes that I have. I wish I was joking. I'm actually shocked to not see more people saying this. Maybe their comments have been voted down for being negative about a classic, but it's the truth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="1548185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=1548185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077181" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Antoshka2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Antoshka2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Oudgasm-Cafe-Oud-19-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-85187.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85187.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Oudgasm Café Oud | 19 Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077181ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077181" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958660">Antoshka2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 15:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful burst of fresh lemons and then it turns more green and piney but very piney, kinda like a Christmas tree with lemons. Definitely not for people who dislike pine. I can’t tell you what any other notes are except citrus and pine but they work really well together. It’s so clean and refreshing. I only bought it because it’s so old and associated with the royal family, I just wanted to smell it and I  didn’t expect to like it. Suitable for all occasions, day or night, formal or casual. A must try for fragrance enthusiasts. That pine is a lot though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="2077181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=2077181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent806680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc806680" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vinyl_junky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vinyl_junky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/GFT-5004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="GFT"title="GFT"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma806680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd806680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736">vinyl_junky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-27">03/27/17 20:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love citrus aromatics, and I love Penhaligon's, but this just didn't work for me. The citrus-lavender-pine combination here just doesn't work. <br />
<br />
The opening is beautiful, with citrus and lavender notes, and you think "Ah, what a lovely eau de cologne!". That's when it starts to go downhill, and the pine kicks in. The pine stays throughout the drydown, and is positively noxious. The best way I can describe this is an eau de cologne trying to be a fougere, and failing miserably.<br />
<br />
I get weak longevity (2 hours, tops) with moderate sillage. If I bother wearing it at all, that is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3940"comment_id="806680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Blenheim-Bouquet-3940.html?ccid=806680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="3940" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="3940":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="3940" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Mmm, Pierre Guillaume Paris Un Crime Exotique 12.1 sounds right up my alley... But I came here to agree with you that Milano Fragranze Panettone is extra nice this time of year... 😊">by

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
